bibl.title: Use and Re-use. An Overview of the Post-Ramesside Burials in TT32.
bibl.note: TT 32, with its large number of secondary burials dating from the Third Intermediate Period to Late Antiquity, offers a paradigmatic example for the re-use of New Kingdom funerary monuments in Thebes. It was used by a priestly family during Late Dynastic-Early Ptolemaic times and probably by the Soter family in the Roman period.

bibl.title: Es werde niedergelegt als Schriftstück. Festschrift für Hartwig Altenmüller zum 65. Geburtstag

bibl.seg: KÁKOSY László † and Gábor SCHREIBER, Use and Re-use. An Overview of the Post-Ramesside Burials in TT32.

Nicole KLOTH, Karl MARTIN und Eva PARDEY (Hgg.), Es werde niedergelegt als Schriftstück. Festschrift für Hartwig Altenmüller zum 65. Geburtstag = Studien zur altägyptischen Kultur. Beihefte. 9 (Hamburg, 2003) pp. 203-209, 2 figg., 1 arbre généal.

TT 32, with its large number of secondary burials dating from the Third Intermediate Period to Late Antiquity, offers a paradigmatic example for the re-use of New Kingdom funerary monuments in Thebes. It was used by a priestly family during Late Dynastic-Early Ptolemaic times and probably by the Soter family in the Roman period.
